content.original: ACTION: Perform a Sensor Lock on all enemies within [FloatParam1] meters, and generates [FloatParam2] Heat for the user. There is a [ActivationCooldown] round cooldown and Ends your Turn.
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Perform a Sensor Lock on all enemies within [FloatParam1] meters, and generates [FloatParam2] Heat for the user. There is a [ActivationCooldown] round cooldown and Ends your Turn.
content.content: 执行:通过传感器锁定[FloatParam1]m内的所有敌人,产生[FloatParam2]热量并结束回合,需要[ActivationCooldown]回合冷却.
